reviews.review:
Ну, ничего такая игра. Но предупреждаю тех, кто хочет её купить. 
Каждый 16-20 ранг и из них каждый 3-4 человек, когда повесит вас, будет кемпить до самой смерти, но ближе к 16 соображают, что надо чинить геники. Вообщем, выбираться из 20 будет сложно.
Мм, большинство манов туннелит, или делает другие вещи, из-за которых можно сгореть.
Но всё-же, человек купил игру за свои деньги, и играет по своим правилам. Всем хорошей игры.

It's a fairly cheap game by nature so there's not much i can really complain about it's really fun just VERY repetitive. Unlike repetitive FPS games where the people you face online are different skill sets so it's always kinda a RNG of playstyles, Dead by Daylight is quite literally you doing the same things over and over. If your a survivor find generators and unhook survivors, if you're a killer run in endless circle loops and try to kill survivors. I really love this game but dude they really need to add different game-modes or more variety if they did it could blow up really huge until then I'll log on every few months just to run in circles and get bored again.
最有趣的地方就在于每次人屠博弈间的快乐，但屠夫玩多了真的累，有时候失误一次节奏就没了
I've tried playing other games but this is the only one I always return to. I am quite obsessed with it.

I have to say i am very disappointed at myself for sleeping on this game for so long. But playing this game after months of having it just sitting their i dont know why i dident pick it up sooner. I absolutely love it i love how fair and balance it is and how good doing combos feel. my favorite character to play is elphelt she is a great character to main with her bomb set ups..... oh wait this isnt guilty gear this game is ok i guess.
This game is more addicting than crack despite having horrible devs and an even worse community
Интересная сетевая игра с великолепнейшим балансом, и сильным командным взаимодействием.

I can't tell what hurts more, my health or how much I've spent on this game.

Satu kalimat untuk review.., Thailand cem kontol :v

+ игры
1) Игра очень интересная так как разрабы не забывают о существований это игры и поддерживаюют её активно
2)Хорошая Система рангов правда подбор рангов хромает 
3)Всё почти сбалансировано и играбельно
- игры 
1) токсики их полно но можно привыкнуть 
2)Как вовсех  играх тут решает пинг причём не хило
3)Конечно баги есть но их мало и их фиксят 
Итог: Как помне игра норм (9.9/10) Если есть деньги берите, Но нужно ещё оставить примерно 500р что-бы купить норм длс с норм манами .

mmmmmmmm step in trap ouch yes. Overall, good game. You need a good computer to play, my computer isnt that outdated but I run everything on as low as possible in order to have a somewhat stable frame rate. the matchmaking system sucks, and this game isnt good if you have a short temper. OTHER than that it is great. Good fun with the friends.

Gosto bastante da dinâmica do game de fugir de um killer, bastante estratégia. O que eu não gosto é não poder se defender. Não podemos dar uma porradinha no killer, eles correm muito mais rapido e tem perks e habilidades muito opressivas, o que torna chato as vezes, pq o killer ganha 80% das partidas se souber jogar bem e apelar. Os sobreviventes tão muito fracos.

I have over 1000 hours in this game. It has its issues. It's not easy to break into but when you spend $20.00 on a game and get that level of playability, it's worth it. I do wish the devs would fix some bugs as well as optimize the game better. Don't buy this game if you don't have a decent PC or it won't be playable.
Jogo muito divertido que te prende por horas sem ver o tempo passar!
fodase minha opniao o jogo é daora cara
платишь 500 рублей за треть игры, остальная часть в длц, как в payday 2, но вот только в payday все длц стоят около 500 по скидке, тут 2к
Muito bom, viciante e muito dinâmico

10/10

Um bom jogo para jogar em grupo de conhecidos, gera muitas risadas e ao mesmo tempo raiva. Acho que melhoraria se tivesse um sistema de voz para poder falar com a galera desconhecida/aleatória, e também acho muito desequilibrado a relação dos killers, já que alguns dão um dano sem noção/slow e ainda correm mais rápido, sei que são características únicas, mas as vezes torna o jogo ruim. Fora isso, super recomendo comprar. Ele não vale os R$36, vale pelo menos R$20.
Horrifying but it's a good game
